00016 public ref class EulerAngles {
00017 
00018  public:
00019          double alpha,beta,gamma;
00020          EulerAngles() : alpha(0),beta(0),gamma(0) { }
00021      EulerAngles(double _alpha,double _beta, double _gamma): alpha(_alpha),beta(_beta),gamma(_gamma) {}
00022      void Set(double _alpha,double _beta, double _gamma) {alpha=_alpha;  beta= _beta; gamma=_gamma; }
00023          void Normalize() { }
00024      EulerAngles^ Normalized() { return this;}
00025 
00026 
00027          bool operator==(EulerAngles o)  { return alpha == o.alpha &&  beta == o.beta && gamma == o.gamma;}
00028          bool operator!=(EulerAngles o) { return alpha != o.alpha ||  beta != o.beta || gamma != o.gamma;}
00029 
00030   
00031  };

00061 public ref class Quaternion {
00062 
00063  public:
00064          double x,y,z,w;
00065          Eigen::Quaterniond* quaterniond;
00066          Quaternion() : x(0),y(0),z(0),w(0) {quaterniond= new Eigen::Quaterniond(); }
00067                  Quaternion(double _w, double _x, double _y, double _z) 
00068                  : x(_x),y(_y),z(_z),w(_w) {quaterniond= new Eigen::Quaterniond();  }
00069          Quaternion(Quaternion ^quat):x(quat->x),y(quat->y),z(quat->z),w(quat->w){} 
00070      //Matrix3d(double _alpha,double _beta, double _gamma): alpha(_alpha),beta(_beta),gamma(_gamma) {}
00071      //void Set(double _alpha,double _beta, double _gamma) {alpha=_alpha;  beta= _beta; gamma=_gamma; }
00072          void Normalize() { }
00073      Quaternion^ Normalized() {this->toEigen(); quaterniond->normalize();this->fromEigen();return this;}
00074 
00075          //private:
00076 
00077          void toEigen(){quaterniond->x()=x;quaterniond->y()=y;quaterniond->z()=z;quaterniond->w()=w;};
00078      void fromEigen(){x=quaterniond->x();y=quaterniond->y();z=quaterniond->z();w=quaterniond->w();};
